CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 22, 1958, pg. 22, reads: "Young Champions - Four of the eight winners in Junior Division of Golden Gloves champions were Negroes. The entire lineup of champions are, left to right: Flyweight Silas Carter, Steubenville A. C.; bantamweight Jim Gruber, Pittsburgh Boys Club; featherweight Hernie Stein, Pittsburgh Boys Club; lightweight Pat Deasy, Glen Hazel Boys Club; welterweight Conrad Williams, Homestead Community Center; middleweight Marion Conner, Steubenville A. C.; light-heavyweight Tom Gererade, Warren, Pa., and heavyweight Jim McLeod, Steubenvile [Steubenville] A. C. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Golden Gloves Junior Division boxing champions, from left: flyweight Silas Carter, bantam weight Jim Gruber, featherweight Hernie Stein, lightweight Pat Deasy, welterweight Conrad Williams, middleweight Marion Conner, light-heavyweight Tom Gererade, and heavyweight Jim McLeod, wearing satin robes and posed with left fists raised, in Pitt Field House, University of Pittsburgh
